summary.aiHeadline: Major Shifts in Global Agriculture: Drought, Declining U.S. Farm Income, and Trade Tensions
summary.aiBlurb: Severe drought in Brazil, a historic drop in U.S. farm income, and escalating trade tensions are reshaping global agricultural markets. Evidence confirms these trends are already impacting prices and exports.
